rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0001
rows.name:
The evacuation of the capital's
citizens... the preparations are
well underway.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah, it's all thanks to everyone's
help. As a member of the Iiran
royal family, you have my thanks.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0003
rows.name:
You don't have to thank me.
I'm a knight of Iira now, too.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0004
rows.name: And besides...

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0006
rows.name:
It's because I've grown
to love this city.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0007
rows.name:
It's a great city.
So full of life and
bustling with people...

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0008
rows.name:
It is.
It's full of everyone's
hopes and bonds.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0009
rows.name:
I agree. It reminds me of
the cities in my own Superbia.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0010
rows.name:
Hearing you say that makes
me want to visit Superbia.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0011
rows.name:
We can all go together.
After we beat Metsu, we
can go with Hugo when he returns home.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0012
rows.name: Yeah, that sounds nice...

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0013
rows.name:
The whole nation will welcome
you with open arms.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0014
rows.name:
I'm not a fan of all that
formal stuff, but...

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0015
rows.name: But[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0016
rows.name: But can we really win? Against Metsu?

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0017
rows.name:
Who knows.
His power is on another level.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0018
rows.name: But it's not limitless. And...

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0019
rows.name:
Adel's gotten a lot better at using
my power than he used to be.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0020
rows.name:
That's right! The way Adel-sama
 is now, he can definitely beat Metsu!

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0021
rows.name: I'll be there to watch! Right, Sata?

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0022
rows.name:
We've come this far,
might as well see it through.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0023
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Milt... Satahiko...

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0024
rows.name: Do you guys even get it?

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0025
rows.name:
Wherever Metsu is,
it's going to be extremely dangerous!

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0026
rows.name:
You'll be risking your lives
just by coming with us!

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0027
rows.name:
Just being near you is
plenty dangerous. It's too late
to worry about that now!

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0028
rows.name:
Honestly, you never run out
of things to say...!

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0029
rows.name:
What's the big deal?
Come on, let's head back to the inn.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0030
rows.name:
We should rest up
before the final battle.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0031
rows.name: You're right.

rows.label: fev11_670_175_msg0032
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] I need to have a serious talk
with Milt and Satahiko...
